content.html: You long for crowded bars full theaters sweaty dancehalls and noisy restaurants but the normal you miss that you ache for is not a physical location it was the peace of mind you had when you believed your society could manage a pandemic that is a normal to which you cannot return
content.value:
You long for
crowded bars
full theaters
sweaty dancehalls
and noisy restaurants
but the normal you miss
that you ache for
is not a physical location
it was the peace of mind you had
when you believed your society
could manage a pandemic
that is a normal
to which you cannot return
